attributes.title: Hardcore Tabletop presents: The Red Dragon Inn | Official Trailer
attributes.caption: The Hardcore Tabletop tradition of transforming beloved tabletop games into a real-life spectacle returns with SlugFest Games’ “The Red Dragon Inn.”
attributes.description:
The Hardcore Tabletop tradition of transforming beloved tabletop games into a real-life spectacle returns with SlugFest Games’ “The Red Dragon Inn.” 

Join a crew of misfit heroes as they put their reputations and their livers on the line. Our adventurers will have to understand themselves and their opponents as they gamble, drink, and roughhouse their way to infamy and fortune. Find out who will be the last one sober and standing starting July 21st on Rooster Teeth!
attributes.display_title: S1:E0 - Hardcore Tabletop presents: The Red Dragon Inn | Official Trailer
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: A Game of Booze, Bluffs & Backstabbing, The Red Dragon Inn Series Premiere
attributes.caption: Adventurers have traveled from across the land to participate in The Red Dragon Inn Tournament! Who will leave with their gold, fortitude and sobriety still intact?
attributes.description: Adventurers have traveled from across the land to participate in The Red Dragon Inn Tournament! Who will leave with their gold, fortitude and sobriety still intact?
attributes.display_title: S1:E1 - A Game of Booze, Bluffs & Backstabbing, The Red Dragon Inn Series Premiere
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: Pooky's Drunken Rampage
attributes.caption: Tensions and drink count rise as piles of gold and fortitude dwindle. Only 1 player can move on to the next round. Will it be Gerki, Pooky, Wizgille or Piper?
attributes.description: Tensions and drink count rise as piles of gold and fortitude dwindle. Only 1 player can move on to the next round. Will it be Gerki, Pooky, Wizgille or Piper?
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: Tricks, Tunes & Transformations
attributes.caption: A new round of players step up to the table! Join Joran the Trickster, Cormac the Mighty, Fleck the Bard, and Ripsnarl, Bad Dog as they put their cards and wits to the test!
attributes.description: A new round of players step up to the table! Join Joran the Trickster, Cormac the Mighty, Fleck the Bard, and Ripsnarl, Bad Dog as they put their cards and wits to the test!
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: Cormac the... Moisty?
attributes.caption: Tensions rise as fortitude and sobriety diminish as Round 2 comes to a close. Which adventurer will move on to the final round!
attributes.description: Tensions rise as fortitude and sobriety diminish as Round 2 comes to a close. Which adventurer will move on to the final round!
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: Captain Whitehawk Storms the Inn!
attributes.caption: Our first round of losers are joined by the ruthless Captain Whitehawk! Everything is on the line as one more loss means they're out for good!
attributes.description: Our first round of losers are joined by the ruthless Captain Whitehawk! Everything is on the line as one more loss means they're out for good!
attributes.display_title: S1:E5 - Captain Whitehawk Storms the Inn!
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: The Return of Gerki!
attributes.caption: In our second losers round, Gerki, Ripsnarl, & Fleck return for a final shot to stay in the competition! Will one move on or will the newcomer Sera the Fleetfooted steal the round?
attributes.description: In our second losers round, Gerki, Ripsnarl, & Fleck return for a final shot to stay in the competition! Will one move on or will the newcomer Sera the Fleetfooted steal the round?
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: The Final Round Begins!
attributes.caption: Piper, Pooky, Cormac & Ripsnarl step up to the table to compete in the final round to take it all!
attributes.description: Piper, Pooky, Cormac & Ripsnarl step up to the table to compete in the final round to take it all!
attributes.show_title: Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn

attributes.title: The Victor is Crowned
attributes.caption: Tensions are high. Rivalries have formed. Only one competitor can claim the ultimate prize. Will it be Piper, Pooky, Cormac or Ripsnarl?
